name: Game Nightmare
description:
A game lover came to visit you, this is the mask.

This horror game has 5 levels that increase the difficulty and add new mechanics ...

How to survive?

  • Don't miss out on the mini-game, it will upset the mask.
  • Watch out for the door, it will come in if it is not seen.
  • You can chase away the monster at the door by flashing the light quickly on the face of the mask.
  • Do not look directly at the black mask with the flashlight on.
  • Leave no alerts for long ...

Keys:

KeyActionA , DMove character from mini-game (Left, Right)SPACEShoot (Mini-game)TABOpen / Close actions menu1,2,3Select actionRight Mouse ButtonTurn on/off the flashlightMouseMoving the camera
